title: Two Men Charged With Scamming Elderly Drivers At Shopping Centres | 10 News
description: Police have busted a state-wide scam targeting seniors at shopping centres. Two Romanian nationals on tourist visas are facing dozens of charges, accused of stealing more than 50 thousand dollars in just five days. title: Albanese Announces Royal Commission Into Bondi Terror Attack | 10 News
description: After weeks of pressure, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a Commonwealth royal commission into antisemitism following the Bondi Beach terror attack. Federal Politics Reporter Matthew Karstunen has the latest. title: Australia Celebrates Ashes Win Over England | 10 News
description: The Aussies are still celebrating at the SCG, after winning the fifth test, to take the Ashes series 4-1. England with reason to complain about snicko once again, while Usman Khawaja received a standing ovation despite getting out cheaply in his final knock. title: PM Calls Bondi Royal Commission, Northern Victoria Bushfires, ICE Fatally Shoots Woman | 10 News+
description: Anthony Albanese has caved after weeks of pressure and announced a royal commission into antisemitism, social cohesion, and the circumstances that lead to the Bondi Beach terror attack. Former High Court judge Virginia Bell is at the helm, and the commission will replace the already announced New South Wales state-based inquiry, and incorporate the review run by former spy chief Dennis Richardson, who will deliver his interim report in April. Jenny Roytur, the niece of Bondi victim Boris Tetleroyd, spoke to 10 News+ about her reaction to the Prime Minister’s announcement.  Victoria is facing the most hazardous heatwave conditions since the Black Summer bushfires of 2019-20, with the South-West, Wimmera, Northern Country and North Central regions issued a catastrophic fire danger rating. Residents of up to a dozen towns are being told to evacuate, as a bushfire currently burning in Longwood continues to spread. A second blaze east of Wodonga is also burning out of control.  Queensland’s north-west has been devastated by a deluge of floodwater after weeks of torrential rain. Farmers are bracing for huge losses, with around 30,000 head of livestock estimated to be dead or missing. Local grazier Beau Harrington from Julia Creek’s Brinard Station spoke to 10 News+ about the harrowing experience of dealing with the destruction from the heart of the floods.  America is once again on edge after Renee Good, a US citizen, was shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis, Minnesota. People have gathered at the site of the shooting to protest and to hold a vigil. The mayor of Minneapolis told ICE to “get the f*ck out” of the city, while US Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem defended the shooting, saying Good had tried to run over the officer before he opened fire. title: French President Macron Says US Is Turning Away From Its Allies | 10 News
description: French President Emmanuel Macron has claimed that the United States "is gradually turning away from its allies" during an address to French ambassadors in Paris.  Macron's comments were linked to the Trump administration's capture of Venezuelan President in a raid on the capital of Caracas on  January 3.  The French President said his nation rejects "new colonialism and new imperialism", also listing China's "commercial aggressiveness" that poses a threat to the European Economy. title: Vice President JD Vance Blames Victim Of Fatal ICE Shooting In Minneapolis | 10 News
description: Vice President JD Vance has cast blame as he responded to reporters' questioning about an ICE officer's fatal shooting of 37-year-old mother of three, Renee Good, in Minneapolis.  Speaking to reporters during a White House briefing Vance said, “I can believe that her death is a tragedy while also recognising that it's a tragedy of her own making and a tragedy of the far left who has marshaled an entire movement, a lunatic fringe against our law enforcement officers.”  He defended the federal immigration agent responsible for Wednesday’s fatal shooting and stated he was doing his job as a federal officer and is protected by “absolute immunity”.  Vance also warned European leaders should take President Trump "seriously" on his push to bring Greenland under US control.
